gen:link.msg:message: `AnnualRent` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU2_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU2_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU2_AnnualRent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU2_AnnualRent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AnnualRent` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovDU2_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovDU2_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`HealthcareInstitution` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU1_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU1_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU1_HealthcareInstitution')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovDU1_HealthcareInstitution return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`HealthcareInstitution` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovDU1_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConcentrationTenantsAdditionalInformationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovDU1_SingleTenantResponsibleForMoreThanOnePercentOfTheAnnualRent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
